data.title: Pink Floyd leaving Capitol for Columbia question [Archive]
data.meta_description: So the band scores the largest selling record in the bands history (due in large part to Capitol Records publicity) and then it's revealed that they are "Disenchanted with their US record company Capitol Records" thus Pink Floyd and O'Rourke negotiated a new contract with Columbia who gave them a reported advance of $1,000,000. Surely there's more behind this story than this..
